dcterms:creator: Yu Sun
Eric Tzeng
Trevor Darrell
Alexei A. Efros
dcterms:description: A suite of continuous control tasks designed for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms, where agents observe raw pixels and must learn to perform various motor control tasks.
dcterms:title: DeepMind Control suite

dcterms:creator: Vincenzo Lomonaco
Karen Desai
Eugenio Culurciello
Davide Maltoni
dcterms:description: A time-constrained, discrete-action 3D navigation task for ViZDoom, where an agent navigates a maze to collect objects while avoiding negative rewards.
dcterms:title: CRLMaze

dcterms:creator: Marek Wydmuch
Michał Kempka
Wojciech Jaśkowski
dcterms:description: A platform for evaluating AI agents in the game Doom, where agents learn to play the game from pixel observations.
dcterms:title: ViZDoom
